title: Kate Green – 2021 Comments on Mental Health Issues Amongst Children
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Secretary of State for Education, on 9 April 2021.
content:
The pressure the Conservatives are putting on children to ‘catch-up’ academically ignores the crucial role mental health and wellbeing play in children’s learning and development.
